message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product that I think you'll love. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to sell it to me for?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would that be a good price for you?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking $130 would be a more reasonable price. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm glad we're getting closer to a deal, Bob. I can do $135, but I was thinking we could meet in the middle of that and my previous offer. How about $137.50?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from $137.50, so how about $136.25?
I'm glad we're so close to a deal, Bob. I can do $138, but I think we can do a bit better than that. How about $138.50?
I'm willing to meet you halfway from $138.50, so how about $138.25?
I think we're really close now, Bob. I can do $139, but I'm not sure if I want to go any higher. Let me think about it...
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than $138.25. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
